commands.title: Generate JSDoc for all JavaScript and TypeScript files.
Generate JSDoc for the current file.

jsdoc-generator.descriptionPlaceholder.description: Set the description placeholder. Empty to disable.

jsdoc-generator.author.description: Set the value for the author tag. Empty to disable, "author" to insert "author" as placeholder.

jsdoc-generator.includeDate.description: When enabled, will include the date tag.

jsdoc-generator.includeTime.description: When both this and jsdoc-generator.includeDate are enabled, will include the current local time in the date tag.

jsdoc-generator.includeParenthesisForMul.description:
When enabled, will include round brackets around union and intersection types.
Note that round brackets will still be used if manually put in the type or for union and intersection types which are also optional or mandatory.

jsdoc-generator.descriptionForConstructo.description:
"{Object}" will be replaced with the class name.
For default exported classes without a name jsdoc-generator.descriptionPlaceholder will be used instead.
Empty to disable.

jsdoc-generator.functionVariablesAsFunct.description: When enabled, will document variables with a function assigned as function declarations. Disable to document like properties.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run eslint:fix
